EventStory.Body:
MDC Partners Inc and Stagwell Group LLC to Combine, Creating Transformative Global Marketing Network - M&A Call
NEW YORK Dec 29, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of MDC Partners Inc M&A conference call or presentation Tuesday, December 22, 2020 at 1:30:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
